{{ja-pos|pronoun|おち|hhira=をち}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=おち}} a [[distant]] [[place]]

subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|一昨日|おとつい}}, {{ja-r|一昨日|おととい|[[day before yesterday]]}}
* {{ja-r|一昨年|おととし}}, {{ja-r|一昨年|おとどし|[[year]] [[before]] [[last year]]}}

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|えん|yomi=kanon}}
From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=えん|-}} {{ltc-l|遠|[[distant]]; [[remote]]; [[far]]|id=1}}, corresponding to modern {{cog|cmn|-}} ''yuǎn'', {{cog|yue|-}} ''jyun<sup>5</sup>''.

As a verb in Chinese compounds like {{m|ja|遠色|tr=enshoku|t=keep aloof from beauty|pos=kun'yomi ''iro o [[遠ざける#Japanese|tōzaku]]''}}, from {{der|ja|ltc|sort=えん|-}} {{ltc-l|遠|[[keep]] at a distance; [[keep away]] from|id=2}}, corresponding to {{cog|cmn|-}} ''yuàn'', {{cog|yue|-}} ''jyun<sup>6</sup>''.

The ''[[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]]'' pronunciation, so likely a later borrowing.
